00000738 <xme_core_dcc_sendTopicData>:
(
	xme_core_dcc_publicationHandle_t publicationHandle,
	void* data,
	uint16_t size
)
{
 738:	b580      	push	{r7, lr}
 73a:	b086      	sub	sp, #24
 73c:	af00      	add	r7, sp, #0
 73e:	60b9      	str	r1, [r7, #8]
 740:	4613      	mov	r3, r2
 742:	4602      	mov	r2, r0
 744:	81fa      	strh	r2, [r7, #14]
 746:	80fb      	strh	r3, [r7, #6]
	xme_core_status_t status = XME_CORE_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE;
 748:	f04f 0306 	mov.w	r3, #6
 74c:	75fb      	strb	r3, [r7, #23]
	// Note: data could also be NULL in case of a plain notification event

	// Send announcements over all relevant interfaces (or schedule them for sending)

	// Store the data in reference counted memory
	XME_CHECK
 74e:	88fb      	ldrh	r3, [r7, #6]
 750:	4618      	mov	r0, r3
 752:	68b9      	ldr	r1, [r7, #8]
 754:	f7ff fffe 	bl	0 <xme_hal_sharedPtr_createFromPointer>
			754: R_ARM_THM_CALL	xme_hal_sharedPtr_createFromPointer
 758:	4603      	mov	r3, r0
 75a:	82bb      	strh	r3, [r7, #20]
 75c:	8abb      	ldrh	r3, [r7, #20]
 75e:	2b00      	cmp	r3, #0
 760:	d102      	bne.n	768 <xme_core_dcc_sendTopicData+0x30>
 762:	f04f 030a 	mov.w	r3, #10
 766:	e023      	b.n	7b0 <xme_core_dcc_sendTopicData+0x78>
	(
		XME_HAL_SHAREDPTR_INVALID_POINTER != (dataHandle = xme_hal_sharedPtr_createFromPointer(size, data)),
		XME_CORE_STATUS_OUT_OF_RESOURCES
	);

	sourceComponent = xme_core_dcc_getComponentFromPublicationHandle(publicationHandle);

00000c1c <xme_core_directory_removePublication>:
(

	xme_core_component_t publishingComponent,
	xme_core_component_port_t publishingPort
)

	XME_ASSERT_NORVAL(NULL != config);

	{
		// We already have a node identifier assigned
		return;
	}

	}

	{
		// Only consider successful responses
		return;

	// NOTE: loginResponse->remoteAnnouncementDataChannel and loginResponse->remoteModifyRoutingTableDataChannel
	//       might be invalid. This means that the local node has just completed login.

	XME_LOG

		XME_LOG_VERBOSE,

00000390 <xme_core_net_plugin_wait_for_state_change>:

xme_core_net_plugin_wait_for_state_change (void)
{

		status = xme_hal_net_selectSocket( xme_core_net_plugin_socket, true, false, 60 );

000012b4 <xme_core_net_plugin_tcp_startWorkingThread>:

xme_core_status_t

00000f34 <xme_core_resourceManager_removePort>:
xme_core_resourceManager_removePort
(
	xme_core_component_t component,
	xme_core_component_port_t port
)
{
     f34:	b580      	push	{r7, lr}
     f36:	b084      	sub	sp, #16
     f38:	af00      	add	r7, sp, #0
     f3a:	4602      	mov	r2, r0
     f3c:	460b      	mov	r3, r1
     f3e:	80fa      	strh	r2, [r7, #6]
     f40:	80bb      	strh	r3, [r7, #4]
